meta.title: Card
meta.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

props.description: When set, will overlay the card body on top of the image (if the card has an image)
Disable rendering of the default inner card-body element

The value to set on the image's 'height' attribute

Set if the image should appear at the bottom of the card
Set if the image should appear at the start (left) of the card
Set if the image should appear at the start (left) of the card. Synonym for the 'left' prop
Set if the image should appear at the end (right) of the card
Set if the image should appear at the end (right) of the card. Synonym for the 'right' prop
